title: ECP extends symbol allotment deadline until 11:30 pm Saturday
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 13 (APP): The Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) has extended the deadline for the allotment of election symbols until 11:30 pm on Saturday for the convenience of political parties and candidates.
According to ECP spokesperson, candidates are now able to obtain symbols from Returning Officers until 11:30 pm on Saturday.
The spokesperson mentioned that the designated time has been extended while awaiting the Supreme Courtâ€™s decision.
